citations.narrative:
Shelter from sunlight. An adult camel named Clyde was tethered to a stake in the middle of a field without access to
shade or shelter. Temperature range this afternoon was between 80 and 81 degrees Fahrenheit and sunny. Sufficient
shade must be provided to protect animals from direct sunlight and to prevent overheating or discomfort. Camel was
moved to a shaded area during the inspection. Correct by ensuring the camel has access to shade from this date
(September 12, 2024) forward.
This inspection was conducted at the Denver fair in Denver, PA.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.127(a) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
Shelter from sunlight. An adult camel named Clyde was tethered to a stake in the middle of a field without access to 
shade or shelter. Temperature range this afternoon was between 80 and 81 degrees Fahrenheit and sunny. Sufficient 
shade must be provided to protect animals from direct sunlight and to prevent overheating or discomfort. Camel was 
moved to a shaded area during the inspection. Correct by ensuring the camel has access to shade from this date 
(September 12, 2024) forward. 
 
This inspection was conducted at the Denver fair in Denver, PA. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
